badges.title: Reclaimer of the Guilty SPARC
badges.description: Awarded for validating a RustChain block on dual-SPARC hardware. He powered up 75MHz of sacred heat, not for speed — but to see two penguins, and to reclaim what others abandoned.

emotional_resonance.trigger: Validator detected on SPARC multi-core hardware

badges.visual_anchor: etched SPARC logo glowing beneath twin Linux penguins over copper sinkplate
